50 inline void gpu_assert(cudaError_t code, const char* file, int line)
51 {
52 #ifdef CGA_DEVICE_SYNCHRONIZE
53  // This device synchronize forces the most recent CUDA call to fully
54  // complete, increasing the chance of catching the CUDA error near the
55  // offending function. Only run if existing code is success to avoid
56  // potentially overwriting previous error code.
57  if (code == cudaSuccess)
58  {
59  code = cudaDeviceSynchronize();
60  }
61 #endif
62 
63  if (code != cudaSuccess)
64  {
65  std::string err = "GPU Error:: " +
66  std::string(cudaGetErrorString(code)) +
67  " " + std::string(file) +
68  " " + std::to_string(line);
69  CGA_LOG_ERROR("{}\n", err);
70  // In Debug mode, this assert will cause a debugger trap
71  // which is beneficial when debugging errors.
72  assert(false);
73  std::abort();
74  }
75 }
76 
83 template <typename IntType, int32_t boundary>
84 __host__ __device__ __forceinline__
85  IntType
86  align(const IntType& value)
87 {
88  static_assert((boundary & (boundary - 1)) == 0, "Boundary for align must be power of 2");
89  return (value + boundary) & ~(boundary - 1);
90 }

92 #ifdef CGA_PROFILING
93 #define CGA_NVTX_RANGE(varname, label) ::claragenomics::cudautils::nvtx_range varname(label)
99 class nvtx_range
102 {
103 public:
104  explicit nvtx_range(char const* name)
105  {
106  nvtxRangePush(name);
107  }
108 
109  ~nvtx_range()
110  {
111  nvtxRangePop();
112  }
113 };
114 #else
115 #define CGA_NVTX_RANGE(varname, label)
121 #endif // CGA_PROFILING

130 class scoped_device_switch
131 {
132 public:
136  explicit scoped_device_switch(int32_t device_id)
137  {
138  CGA_CU_CHECK_ERR(cudaGetDevice(&device_id_before_));
139  CGA_CU_CHECK_ERR(cudaSetDevice(device_id));
140  }
141 
143  ~scoped_device_switch()
144  {
145  cudaSetDevice(device_id_before_);
146  }
147 
148  scoped_device_switch() = delete;
149  scoped_device_switch(scoped_device_switch const&) = delete;
150  scoped_device_switch& operator=(scoped_device_switch const&) = delete;
151 
152 private:
153  int32_t device_id_before_;
154 };
155 
156 } // namespace claragenomics
